entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -20.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sept-Îles Airport 4:00 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -20.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 48.3 km
Humidity: 43 %
Wind Chill: -32
Dewpoint: -29.6°C
Wind: NW 26 km/h gust 54 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then periods of light snow. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 this evening then becoming light near midnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
